attributes.action: Sack Chancellor of the Excheqeur Alistair Darling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the seriousness of the loss of 25 million records containing personal data of families receiving Child Benefit, and the inadequate reassurance that was given in Parliament, Alistair Darling clearly underestimates just how serious this is for all persons affected. There is also a security risk inasmuch as terrorist could obtain identities of British subjects and ease their way into the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
